Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The trial was discontinued after 20 cases because of an unacceptable incidence of side effects .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| side effects |

In this paragraph, the "Disease" entities refer to any health conditions or adverse effects resulting from a trial of a medical treatment. Here, the text mentions "an unacceptable incidence of side effects", which implies that the trial participants experienced certain unfavorable health issues, hence the term "side effects" is identified as a Disease entity.
